item.title: Docker Bind Mounts & Volumes
item.description: Difference between bind mounts & volumes in docker.

I am Aniruddha. I love making software and building systems. I am from Kolkata, India. I am in the final year of my Bachelor’s in Computer Science & Engineering at Tezpur University. I have a separate website listing all my projects. Alternatively, you can checkout my GitHub. I maintain a list of recommended learning resources for a range of CS, ML & Math topics (you can expect some more fun stuff there).
